db:abstract.db:para: Defines a logging category in QML.
This type was introduced in Qt 5.8.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: A logging category can be passed to console.log() and friends as the first argument. If supplied to to the logger the LoggingCategory's name will be used as Logging Category otherwise the default logging category will be used.

db:note.db:para: As the creation of objects is expensive, it is encouraged to put the needed LoggingCategory definitions into a singleton and import this where needed.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.12] defaultLogLevel : enumeration
db:section.db:para: Holds the default log level of the logging category. By default it is created with the LoggingCategory.Debug log level.

db:note.db:para: This property needs to be set when declaring the LoggingCategory and cannot be changed later.

db:section.db:para: This property was introduced in Qt 5.12.

db:section.db:title: name : string
db:section.db:para: Holds the name of the logging category.

db:note.db:para: This property needs to be set when declaring the LoggingCategory and cannot be changed later.
